questions.question: In the sentence "The cat crept silently across the room," the word "silently" is an adverb of _____.
questions.explanation: "Silently" describes how the cat moved.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of place?
questions.explanation: "Underneath" refers to a location or position.

questions.question: She _____ practices yoga to maintain her flexibility.
questions.explanation: "Rarely" is an adverb of time indicating how often she practices yoga.

questions.question: The children played _____ in the garden.
questions.explanation: "Loudly" is an adverb of manner describing how the children played.

questions.question: The cat is sleeping _____ the couch.
questions.explanation: "Under" is an adverb of place indicating the location of the cat.

questions.question: She _____ arrives late to class.
questions.explanation: "Never" is an adverb of time indicating how often she arrives late.

questions.question: He _____ climbed the mountain.
questions.explanation: "Bravely" is an adverb of manner describing how he climbed the mountain.

questions.question: I'll meet you _____ the library.
questions.explanation: "Inside" is an adverb of place indicating where the meeting will occur.

questions.question: The train _____ departs at 7 AM.
questions.explanation: "Punctually" is an adverb of manner describing how the train departs.

questions.question: She _____ goes for a morning jog.
questions.explanation: "Regularly" is an adverb of time indicating how often she goes for a jog.

questions.question: In the sentence "She _____ completed the project," which adverb of manner best fits the blank?
questions.explanation: "Successfully" describes how she completed the project.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of place?
questions.explanation: "Underneath" refers to a location or position.

questions.question: In the sentence "I _____ visit my grandparents," which adverb of time best fits the blank?
questions.explanation: "Regularly" indicates how often the person visits their grandparents.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of manner?
questions.explanation: "Enthusiastically" describes how an action is done.

questions.question: In the sentence "I'll finish the project _____ I can,” the missing adverb is most likely one of _____.
questions.explanation: "As soon as" indicates when the action will be done.

questions.question: In the sentence "She danced _____." The missing adverb is most likely one of _____.
questions.explanation: The adverb “gracefully” shows how she danced and is an adverb of manner.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of manner?
questions.explanation: "Cautiously" describes how an action is done.

questions.question: In the sentence "The book is _____ the shelf," which adverb of place best fits the blank?
questions.explanation: "On" indicates the location of the book relative to the shelf.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of time?
questions.explanation: "Occasionally" indicates how often an action occurs.

questions.question: Which of the following is an adverb of place?
questions.explanation: "Nearby" refers to a location close to the speaker or subject.
